Shoreline.Edmonds Homeschool Resource Center: Edmonds Heights K-12 is a parent-school partnership program which supports parents who choose to be the primary educators of their children. This "alternative learning" program brings together a dynamic, uniquely diverse learning community where creativity and individual involvement thrive. EHK12 offers many classes taught by State of Washington certificated teachers, as well as workshops taught by non-certificated instructors with specialty skills.
